description: Search for media resources including movies, TV shows, anime, etc. Supports searching by title, year, type, and other criteria. Returns detailed media information from TMDB database.
name: search_media

explanation.description: Clear explanation of why this tool is being used in the current context

title.description: The title of the media to search for (e.g., 'The Matrix', 'Breaking Bad')

year.description: Release year of the media (optional, helps narrow down results)

media_type.description: Type of media content: 'movie' for films, 'tv' for television series, 'anime' for anime series

season.description: Season number for TV shows and anime (optional, only applicable for series)

description: Add media subscription to create automated download rules for movies and TV shows. The system will automatically search and download new episodes or releases based on the subscription criteria.
name: add_subscribe

explanation.description: Clear explanation of why this tool is being used in the current context

title.description: The title of the media to subscribe to (e.g., 'The Matrix', 'Breaking Bad')

year.description: Release year of the media (required for accurate identification)

media_type.description: Type of media content: 'movie' for films, 'tv' for television series

season.description: Season number for TV shows (optional, if not specified will subscribe to all seasons)

tmdb_id.description: TMDB database ID for precise media identification (optional but recommended for accuracy)

description: Search for torrent files across configured indexer sites based on media information. Returns available torrent downloads with details like file size, quality, and download links.
name: search_torrents

explanation.description: Clear explanation of why this tool is being used in the current context

title.description: The title of the media resource to search for (e.g., 'The Matrix 1999', 'Breaking Bad S01E01')

year.description: Release year of the media (optional, helps narrow down search results)

media_type.description: Type of media content: 'movie' for films, 'tv' for television series

season.description: Season number for TV shows (optional, only applicable for series)

sites.description: Array of specific site IDs to search on (optional, if not provided searches all configured sites)

description: Add torrent download task to the configured downloader (qBittorrent, Transmission, etc.). Downloads the torrent file and starts the download process with specified settings.
name: add_download

explanation.description: Clear explanation of why this tool is being used in the current context

torrent_title.description: The display name/title of the torrent (e.g., 'The.Matrix.1999.1080p.BluRay.x264')

torrent_url.description: Direct URL to the torrent file (.torrent) or magnet link

downloader.description: Name of the downloader to use (optional, uses default if not specified)

save_path.description: Directory path where the downloaded files should be saved (optional, uses default path if not specified)

labels.description: Comma-separated list of labels/tags to assign to the download (optional, e.g., 'movie,hd,bluray')

description: Query subscription status and list all user subscriptions. Shows active subscriptions, their download status, and configuration details.
name: query_subscribes

explanation.description: Clear explanation of why this tool is being used in the current context

status.description: Filter subscriptions by status: 'active' for enabled subscriptions, 'inactive' for disabled ones, 'all' for all subscriptions

media_type.description: Filter by media type: 'movie' for films, 'tv' for television series, 'all' for all types

description: Query download status and list all active download tasks. Shows download progress, completion status, and task details from configured downloaders.
name: query_downloads

explanation.description: Clear explanation of why this tool is being used in the current context

downloader.description: Name of specific downloader to query (optional, if not provided queries all configured downloaders)

status.description: Filter downloads by status: 'downloading' for active downloads, 'completed' for finished downloads, 'paused' for paused downloads, 'all' for all downloads

description: Query downloader configuration and list all available downloaders. Shows downloader status, connection details, and configuration settings.
name: query_downloaders

explanation.description: Clear explanation of why this tool is being used in the current context

description: Get trending and popular media recommendations from various sources. Returns curated lists of popular movies, TV shows, and anime based on different criteria like trending, ratings, or calendar schedules.
name: get_recommendations

explanation.description: Clear explanation of why this tool is being used in the current context

source.description: Recommendation source: 'tmdb_trending' for TMDB trending content, 'douban_hot' for Douban popular content, 'bangumi_calendar' for Bangumi anime calendar

media_type.description: Type of media content: 'movie' for films, 'tv' for television series, 'all' for all types

limit.description: Maximum number of recommendations to return (default: 20, maximum: 100)

description: Query media library status and list all media files that have been successfully processed and added to the media server (Plex, Emby, Jellyfin). Shows library statistics and file details.
name: query_media_library

explanation.description: Clear explanation of why this tool is being used in the current context

media_type.description: Type of media content: 'movie' for films, 'tv' for television series, 'all' for all types

title.description: Specific media title to search for (optional, if provided returns detailed info for that specific media)

description: Send notification message to the user through configured notification channels (Telegram, Slack, WeChat, etc.). Used to inform users about operation results, errors, or important updates.
name: send_message

explanation.description: Clear explanation of why this tool is being used in the current context

message.description: The message content to send to the user (should be clear and informative)

message_type.description: Type of message: 'info' for general information, 'success' for successful operations, 'warning' for warnings, 'error' for error messages
